title: Musk's Super PAC Jumps into Florida's Special Elections
summary: Elon Musk's America PAC spent $20,488.90 on texting services to support two Republican candidates in Florida special House elections: Jimmy Patronis (1st District) and Randy Fine (6th District). The strategic spending demonstrates Musk's continued political engagement while serving as a White House adviser, with Randy Fine ultimately winning his race.
description: Elon Musk's America PAC has started spending in two Republican-held Florida House races to support candidates Jimmy Patronis and Randy Fine ahead of their special elections, both in districts previously won by Trump by large margins.

sources.title: Musk's super PAC jumps into Florida's special elections
